chapters.title: Chapter 38: Wounds
chapters.info: Ramola, p. 589—Aes Sedai of the Black Ajah. Egwene encounters her in Tel'aran'rhiod, fighting back-to-back with Alviarin; they were bait, attempting to get Egwene to chase them into Mesaana's trap. Unfortunately for all of them, no trap would hold Egwene in the World of Dreams that day.
